contents.text: IN MOST OF the world we have a cover contemplating how to avoid a superpower conflict. Tensions between America and China in relation to Taiwan make war a distinct possibility.
Leader: How to avoid war over TaiwanBriefing: America and China are preparing for a war over TaiwanSpecial report: Frontline Formosa

In Britain we consider an unpleasant question rather closer to home: what to do about the country’s woeful life expectancy? In the past decade hundreds of thousands of people have died earlier than might have been expected.
Leader: Britain has endured a decade of early deaths. Why?Britain: Life expectancy in Britain has flatlined in the last ten years
For subscribers only: to see how we design each week’s cover, sign up to our weekly Cover Story newsletter.
